jobTitle: sr. Project Manager Supply Chain - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you passionate about revolutionizing supply chain solutions using Oracle and Transportation Management expertise?

We're looking for a dynamic Supply Chain Solution Architect for a remote position in the US. If you have over 8 years of experience and a strong background in Anaplan, we want to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities

Leverage 6-10 years of experience in Supply Chain Consulting or Project Management to innovate and lead our supply chain operations.

Utilize exceptional communication, problem-solving, analytical, and conceptual skills to tackle complex challenges.

Design company network structures to optimize cost, service, and flexibility. Determine optimal site locations, inventory levels, and efficient transportation lanes.

Support Business Development Initiatives by creating facility designs that integrate Operations, IT Systems, Safety, and Quality. Develop layouts and workflows that enhance operational efficiency.

Collaborate closely with clients and internal teams to understand business needs, define data requirements, and conduct thorough analyses to develop effective supply chain strategies.

Qualifications

Strong proficiency in Oracle and Transportation Management systems.

Expertise in Anaplan and its application in supply chain management.

Demonstrated ability to conceptualize and implement innovative solutions.

Experience in designing network structures, optimizing facility layouts, and defining transportation logistics.

Proven track record of leading cross-functional teams to achieve client goals and deliver outstanding results.

How To Apply

If you're ready to make a significant impact in supply chain management and thrive in a dynamic, remote work environment, please submit your resume to [insert email address] or click "Apply Now" to join our team.

Employment Type: Full-Time
